    public static final class AlertsManager.IncidentAlertOptions
extends AlertsManager.RouteIncidentAlertOptions
    Options for AlertsManager.createIncidentAlert(IncidentAlertOptions, IIncidentsAlertListener) .

        forwardConeAngle - The angle of the cone we want to filter incidents. See setForwardConeAngle(float).

    • Method Detail

      • setForwardConeAngle

        public final AlertsManager.IncidentAlertOptions setForwardConeAngle(float value)
        Sets the angle of the cone to search ahead for incidents.

        By default this angle is set to 90 degrees. Valid values must fall between FORWARD_CONE_ANGLE_MIN and FORWARD_CONE_ANGLE_MAX.

        Parameters:
        value - The forward cone angle value in degrees.
        Returns:
        This instance of the AlertsManager.IncidentAlertOptions class.
        Throws:
        AlertsManager.AlertsManagerException - When the forward cone angle is out of range.

        String representation of AlertsManager.IncidentAlertOptions.

        toString in class AlertsManager.RouteIncidentAlertOptions
